features: ☀Multiple Colors Package For Choose: Our active cute sports bras for women have many colors. You can select 2 pack, 3 pack,4 pack and 5 pack according to you need. Kindly Note: S fits for 30B 30C 32A 32B 32C ; M fits for 32D 34A 34B 34C 34D ; L fits for 32DD 34DD 36A 36B ; XL fits for 36C 36D 36DD 38A 38B 38C ; XXL fits for 38D 38DD 40A 40B 40C 42A 42B. ( *Warm Tip: Hand wash and air dry is recommended for longer life of the fabric*)

☀4-Way Stretch Breathable Fabric：These cropped seamless workout bras are made of high elastic upgraded fabric (90% Nylon and 10% Spandex).Upgraded fabric is very flattering,soft,sweating-wicking and 4-way stretch,can make sure full cover of your body,feel like your second skin to keep you cool and comfortable.Don't worry about they moves when you put on these strappy athletic bras because the widen thick band underneath the breast ensures tight security that fits a range of movement.

☀Cute Crisscross Design: These crisscross althletic bras with strappy back style always keeping your perfect shape. Strappy bralettes look very beautiful with high waist leggings, workout pants or the top with high waisted jeans and accessories as well!

☀Removable Soft Pads: soft pads for the bralettes portion can be removed when you need wash. This sexy athletic bra cup pad can be easy to put in and out. The top is flattering in the chest area, isn't too low or too high and there's plenty of comfortable space for the girls to breathe.

☀Multifunctional Bra: you can wear this cross open back top bra in any different occasions. The wireless cute sports bra is ideal for low to medium impact activities like yoga, pilates, walking, running, dance, gym class and everyday wear. Also can be makes a great leisure or sleep bra.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do not usually write reviews but felt the need to on these. The moment I put one on, I knew it was perfect. These are so comfortable and even flattering. They are not constricting and really cute, especiallythr back. You can wear it with leggings or shorts by itself. I will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MUST OWN BRALETTES!
reviews.reviewText: I'll be one of those people because it's the truth I rarely write a review as I know what should! I'm 200 pounds 5 foot tall with 36E breast ... I got an XL... I may have been able to go with the barge, but only if I wanted a really snug fit and extra cleavage lol. I am so shocked and pleased with the quality and fabric of this bra! It's hit or miss sometimes as you girls know, but this is one of those moments where we say oh my god this is actually really cute lol!!!! I thought they were just going to be a plain bra but they have an odd bit of structure to them, thick material and slightly padded... I guess this is how some of the reviews had ladies that look really good wearing this as just a shirt I would do exactly the same once I am rid of my tummy! But for now it is a very comfortable nice. Looking sports bra definitely worth it! I'm also really pleased, but again surprise that the straps do not dig into my skin at all. They are really sexy looking with. I will say it again really great support. I've had it on for a few hours and I still can't tell it's there so if someone is on the fence and wants a very tight fit, they could go down a size but if you want it to be comfortable go with your actual size. Oh, and I do black blue and white… The classics! I also have never said this before and low-key think it's cheesy but who cares I literally want these and all the colors!🤣🤣🤣

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and flattering. Low integrity.
reviews.reviewText: These bras look fantastic and work well for the price. They do not provide strong support. I would recommend these for recreational/light activity or daily use, but not athletics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big chests don’t phase these sports bras.
reviews.reviewText: I love how these bras immediately just held my breast up, supported and perked them for ultimate workout needs.I wear these often when I’m wearing tank tops, outfits with lower backs, or need some extra support.The padding is nude for colors, black for the black, and white for the white. They are slightly padded for extra umph, but also is automatically shaped to cover the entire breast.The coverage of the cloth is full, and double lined, leaving I padded bras little to the imagination, because you can’t see nips.The straps were hands to straighten at first, I’m not gunna lie. It was a “hey babe, can you help me with my bra straps please?” But then after a few tries, you’ll find a way to straighten them out yourself.Wash in cold, hang dry. This fabric does shrink in low heat. I’m a Large breast, 36DD and sized up to an XL and shrank my bras the first wash. They are slightly tight after wearing them all day long, but we’re the perfect fit had they not shrank. So, if you hang dry always, you’ll have a true to fit size, otherwise - size up twice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These sports bras are so so cute!!! I have never been able to wear something like this before I had a breast reduction but now that I can I love them so much!! I am a 36DD, Not only are they comfy and supportive they are also incredibly cute! They are amazingly pretty and although there are a lot of straps it truly doesn’t feel like the straps have ever dug into my shoulders either. I have had these for about a year now and they work the same as when I first got them! They also show no signs of any wear or tare which I am incredibly happy about!! I highly recommend these!!! Even to girls on the bigger side of things

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super cute but not comfy
reviews.reviewText: For reference, I’m 140lbs 5’6” and wear a 34C. I bought size Large just because the reviews said they fit small. These were still very very tight, which isn’t a huge deal because I prefer compression. I’m hoping after washing, they are a bit less tight but again, not a huge deal.My biggest complaint is that they roll up- badly. I wore them casually before wearing them to the gym, just to get an idea of how they would feel. I’m so glad I did, I couldn’t imagine adjusting or pulling down the top a million times while exercising. It would be so frustrating. Every time I sit down, it rolls up. I can feel it rolling up while walking.Besides rolling up, they are pretty great. Super cute, the straps don’t get twisted, the cups have great support. I just wish they didn’t roll up 😭

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and quality
reviews.reviewText: These fit great and the material quality feels very soft on the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So comfortable, fit well, flattering. I can’t find anything to complain about.

reviews.reviewerName: This one didn’t work for me
reviews.reviewText: I do really like them. They are fantastic for the price. They look great. They are not as comfortable as to what I’m use to but I normally pay $50/sports bra. I did read the reviews and took the advice to size up. They fit perfectly sizing up for me. I’d highly recommendGetting be of my bras came with mangled straps but I’m still happy overall with the purchase for the price

I bought these based on the other reviews. Colours are so nice and I love the back. Material is nice and soft. They do fit small and I ordered based on my size knowing by the other reviews they would be snug. I run so I like them to fit tighter. If you like a snugger fit order your size if not size up one. I would buy again as they are better than I expected. Can’t beat the price for 5 bras.

Super cute and super flattering! I listened to the other reviews and despite the size chart saying I'm a medium being I'm 5'9" 140lbs and a 34D, I sized up and went with large and they fit perfect!! Haven't actually tried a workout yet but can tell it won't be enough support for a high-intensity workout, but perfect for the low-intensity workouts and yoga I do. They also seem cute enough to flash under a cute shirt or even wear on it's own in the summer! Love the colours and the price point was great-- all around very pleased!

reviews.reviewTitle: Ne conviens pas a toute les poitrine
reviews.reviewText: Ne conviens pas a toute les poitrine pour le support les bretelles sont cheaps un des mienne sest casser et twiste et provoqué un frottement et de l'héritation sur ma peau . Jai du commander et retourner 3 fois larticle a grandeur differente et Aucune ne conviennent, et est inconfortable
I originally order these in small since im a xsmall in tops but they were too small, i loved the price, look and quality so ordered the medium and they are perfect...great deal just order a size up
